byline.contributor: Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Washington.

abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter tells reporters at Operating Base Fenty in eastern Afghanistan that Islamic State group is establishing footholds in country, which will complicate threats Afghan security forces face.
lead_paragraph: The presence of the militant group adds to the complex array of threats confronting Afghan forces and their international partners, Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter said Friday.

headline.main: ISIS Building ‘Little Nests’ in Afghanistan, U.S. Defense Secretary Warns
headline.print_headline: Islamic State Building ‘Nests’ in Afghanistan, U.S. Says

snippet: The presence of the militant group adds to the complex array of threats confronting Afghan forces and their international partners, Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter said Friday.
